Integrate with X-Sendfile or X-Accel on: Integrate with X-Sendfile or X-Accel on the server to improve file preview performance.
Upload larger files in specified size ch: Upload larger files in specified size chunks to improve upload speed and allow resumable uploads.
Maximum upload size on your server curre: Maximum upload size on your server currently is set to :size
Disk space (in bytes) each user uploads: Disk space (in bytes) each user uploads are allowed to take up.
If necessary, you may log out of all of: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Your recent sessions are listed below. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
There are no items matching your query: There are no items matching your query
Your changes will be lost if you continu: Your changes will be lost if you continue. Are you sure you want to discard them?
This file type is not allowed: This file type is not allowed
Preview for :name: Preview for :name
This file is too large to preview.
There was an issue previewing this file: There was an issue previewing this file
From which folder emails should be impor: From which folder emails should be imported. Leave empty to import all emails in the inbox.
Create new tickets from emails received: Create new tickets from emails received via this connection.
If email is in reply to existing ticket,: If email is in reply to existing ticket, create a new reply.
Configure different handlers for turning: Configure different handlers for turning incoming emails into tickets and replies. You can enable multiple handlers at the same time.
Send emails to :siteName from a 3rd part: Send emails to :siteName from a 3rd party application or a different website using REST API.
Send emails to :siteName using Mailgun i: Send emails to :siteName using Mailgun inbound routes functionality.
Verify that incoming request is really f: Verify that incoming request is really from mailgun. It's highly recommended to have this on, unless you are not able to receive emails from mailgun otherwise.
Connect your existing gmail acocunt usin: Connect your existing gmail acocunt using gmail API.
Pipe emails to :siteName from cpanel or: Pipe emails to :siteName from cpanel or another control panel used by your hosting provider.
Connect your existing email accounts to: Connect your existing email accounts to :siteName using IMAP.
Usually the domain of your site (site.co: Usually the domain of your site (site.com)
Can be left empty, if your mailgun accou: Can be left empty, if your mailgun account is in the US region.
Configure the sender information for all: Configure the sender information for all outgoing application emails.
All outgoing application emails will be: All outgoing application emails will be sent from this email address.
All outgoing application emails will be sent using this name.
Your selected mail method must be author: Your selected mail method must be authorized to send emails using this address and name.
Configure where contact form submissions: Configure where contact form submissions should be sent.
Where emails from :contactPageUrl page s: Where emails from :contactPageUrl page should be sent to.
Configure which method should be used fo: Configure which method should be used for sending outgoing application emails.
You already have the latest version inst: You already have the latest version installed
Update your system to the latest version: Update your system to the latest version. This will download and install updates automatically, please do not close this page while update is in progress.
Update completed successfully! Reloading: Update completed successfully! Reloading the page...
Relative or absolute path where uploads: Relative or absolute path where uploads should be stored. Leave empty to use default location.
Custom domain or CDN url from which to s: Custom domain or CDN url from which to serve files uploaded to this backend.
This backend is used by some upload type: This backend is used by some upload types. Detach it first to remove.
Are you sure you want to remove this bac: Are you sure you want to remove this backend?
This <b>will not</b> delete files upload: This will not delete files uploaded using this backend, so you can re-attach it later at the same path.
If you want to delete the files first, y: If you want to delete the files first, you can do it from the files page, using backend filter.
Changing type, path, host or bucket sett: Changing type, path, host or bucket settings will make files previosuly uploaded to this backend unavailable. Consider creating a new backend instead.
Click the 'get access code' button to ge: Click the 'get access code' button to get dropbox access code, then paste it into the field below.
Upload files directly from user's browse: Upload files directly from user's browser to cloud storage, bypassing your server. This improves upload speeds and reduces server bandwidth usage.
Use AI to generate a concise conversatio: Use AI to generate a concise conversation summary, keywords and overall customer sentiment.
Generated on :date by :name: Generated on :date by :name
Find more settings on AI Agent page: Find more settings on AI Agent page
Choose which LLM provider and model to u: Choose which LLM provider and model to use for AI functionality.
Configure how knowledge like websites, d: Configure how knowledge like websites, documents and articles are ingested.
Your content is currently being ingested: Your content is currently being ingested. You will be notified once the ingestion is complete. In the meantime, AI agent may not have your latest content.
If AI agent is unable to assist user: If AI agent is unable to assist user
Choose what happens when AI agent is una: Choose what happens when AI agent is unable to help the customer
say why you are unable to help and ask i: say why you are unable to help and ask if you can help with something else.
Show a greeting and buttons or start wit: Show a greeting and buttons or start with a flow
Send a greeting message and show buttons: Send a greeting message and show buttons
The name your customers will see.
Use a JPG, PNG, or GIF smaller than 100K: Use a JPG, PNG, or GIF smaller than 100KB. 50px by 50px works best.
Determines tone of voice for AI generate: Determines tone of voice for AI generated messages
If customer asks to speak to human agent: If customer asks to speak to human agent
Transfer customer to first available age: Transfer customer to first available agent or put into queue
say that there are no available agents r: say that there are no available agents right now and ask if you can help instead
Use content from the articles in your he: Use content from the articles in your help center

Scan only child pages of specified url.
Scan all pages of specified domain.
When specified, only content inside this: When specified, only content inside this selector will be extracted. Leave empty to extract content from the entire page. Must be a valid CSS selector as accepted by the document.querySelectorAll() function.
Add a list of CSS selectors you want to: Add a list of CSS selectors you want to ignore when scraping content. We already exclude some elements like navigation, scripts, footer, inline images etc.

Whether webpage is queued for scanning: Whether webpage is queued for scanning

Save them and reset conversation to test: Save them and reset conversation to test the current version.
Map any response data you want to use in: Map any response data you want to use in custom flows. AI agent can use all data automatically, without manual mapping.
Explain when the AI agent should use thi: Explain when the AI agent should use this tool. Include a description of what this tool does, data it provides or actions it can perform.
AI Agent will use the name and descripti: AI Agent will use the name and description of the tool to determine when to trigger it
Allow AI Agent to use this tool directly: Allow AI Agent to use this tool directly without adding it to a flow
Test with live response data from the AP: Test with live response data from the API to make sure it is configured correctly

Import content from documents that are n: Import content from documents that are not available publicly

Provide files and we'll fetch all the te: Provide files and we'll fetch all the text data inside.
Only text based formats are supported, i: Only text based formats are supported, including: PDF, Office, PowerPoint, Excel, CSV, JSON, XML
Get started by adding a new tool.
Endpoint that should be called by AI Age: Endpoint that should be called by AI Agent to retrieve data or send updates. You can use attributes or data collected by AI Agent in the URL, headers or request body.
Specify the data AI agent should collect: Specify the data AI agent should collect from the customer before using this tool. AI agent will collect them from conversation history or by asking the customer.
Definition of data required so AI agent: Definition of data required so AI agent knows how to collect it
Example: 8 digit identifier of the purch: Example: 8 digit identifier of the purchase. A customer can find this identifier in their purchase history
Show up to 6 articles to customers: Show up to 6 articles to customers
Show up to 10 buttons to customers: Show up to 10 buttons to customers
Can't delete a button that has child ste: Can't delete a button that has child steps
Select a list from tool response to use: Select a list from tool response to use for showing dynamic buttons
Collect details from customers for use l: Collect details from customers for use later in the flow.
Select a list from tool response to use: Select a list from tool response to use for showing dynamic cards
Set a value for one or more attributes.
Here you can describe the customer inten: Here you can describe the customer intent. If AI Agent determines that user message matches this intent, this flow will be triggered. If left empty, this flow will only be triggerable manually (for example, by clicking on a button in greeting message).
Only tools that are set to live will be: Only tools that are set to live will be selectable here.

Manage branches and the conditions that: Manage branches and the conditions that determine which branch to take.

Share a link to direct chat page without: Share a link to direct chat page without needing to install chat widget on your website.
Subtitle: Subtitle
When agent has not responded for :minute: When agent has not responded for :minutes minutes, transfer customer to another available agent.
When there are no messages for :minutes: When there are no messages for :minutes minutes, mark chat as inactive.
When there are no messages for :minutes minutes, close the chat.
If chat is in a group with manual assign: If chat is in a group with manual assignment, chat will be put into queue instead.
Inactive chats are not included in agent: Inactive chats are not included in agents' concurrent chats limit.
Customers can reopen closed chats by sen: Customers can reopen closed chats by sending a new message to that chat.
Form will not be visible to customers wh: Form will not be visible to customers when disabled.
Whether active agent avatars should be v: Whether active agent avatars should be visible.
Greeting for when user name is available: Greeting for when user name is available.
Greeting for when user name is not avail: Greeting for when user name is not available.
You can translate these messages from <a: You can translate these messages from localizations page.
To install livechat widget on your site,: To install livechat widget on your site, copy and paste this code snippet before the </body> tag on every page you want the widget to appear.
If your helpdesk is on a different domai: If your helpdesk is on a different domain than the loader script, or you need to specify the domain manuallly for some other reason, you can specify it via settings:
When enabled, chat launcher will be hidd: When enabled, chat launcher will be hidden by default and will need to be shown manually via API.
Route conversations to groups by creatin: Route conversations to groups by creating a trigger
List your trusted domains and subdomains: List your trusted domains and subdomains, separated by commas. To mark all your subdomains as trusted, use an asterisk as a placeholder like this: *.example.com. If you leave this field blank, your chat widget can be added to any domain.
When identifiying logged in users in wid: When identifiying logged in users in widget, always verify identity using secret key.
Use themes configured <a>globally</a>, o: Use themes configured globally, or set unique colors for chat widget.
